p: The virus can be transmitted not only from animals to humans but also from humans to humans [ 23]. A Lancet report demonstrated that the virus could have recently acquired the ability to transmit between humans [ 6]. A report of five patients in a family cluster who traveled to Wuhan and were infected with SARS-CoV-2 was the first report directly illustrating that the virus is capable of person-to-person transmission in hospital and family settings [ 23].
